import{d as h,r as g,a as p,b as z,n as D,l as w,o as S}from"./index-BjEuYp6c.js";const C=h({__name:"PanelResizer",props:{maxDimension:{type:Number,default:350},minDimension:{type:Number,default:280},dimension:{type:Number,default:300},side:{type:String,default:"right",validator:e=>["left","right","top","bottom"].includes(e)},resizeSensitivity:{type:Number,default:1}},emits:{resize:e=>e},setup(e,{expose:d,emit:l}){const t=e,u=l,o=g(!1);d({dragActive:o});function c(s){const a=s.clientX,f=s.clientY,v=t.dimension,y=s.target,b=document.body.style.cursor;document.body.style.cursor=window.getComputedStyle(y).cursor;const m=i=>{let n=0;["top","bottom"].includes(t.side)?n=(i.clientY-f)*(t.side==="top"?-1:1)*t.resizeSensitivity:n=(i.clientX-a)*(t.side==="left"?-1:1)*t.resizeSensitivity;let r=v+n;r=Math.min(Math.max(t.minDimension,r),t.maxDimension),u("resize",r),o.value=!0,i.preventDefault()};document.addEventListener("mousemove",m),document.addEventListener("mouseup",i=>{document.body.style.cursor=b,document.removeEventListener("mousemove",m),o.value=!1,i.preventDefault()},{once:!0})}return(s,a)=>(S(),p("div",{class:D(["absolute z-20",{"top-0 h-full w-1 hover:cursor-ew-resize":e.side==="left"||e.side==="right","left-0 right-0 h-1 hover:cursor-ns-resize":e.side==="top"||e.side==="bottom","left-0":e.side==="left","right-0":e.side==="right","top-0":e.side==="top","bottom-0":e.side==="bottom","bg-surface-gray-3":o.value}]),onMousedown:w(c,["prevent"])},[z(s.$slots,"default")],34))}});export{C as _};
//# sourceMappingURL=PanelResizer.vue_vue_type_script_setup_true_lang-BduBo3MG.js.map
